name: types-slot-cars
description: TypeScript definitions and Zod schemas for slot-cars

scripts.check-main-branch: bash -c 'CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && if [ "$CURRENT_BRANCH" != "main" ]; then echo "Error: Not on main branch. Please switch to main branch."; exit 1; fi'
scripts.publish:patch: npm run check-main-branch && bun run build && standard-version --release-as patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run check-main-branch && bun run build && standard-version --release-as minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run check-main-branch && bun run build && standard-version --release-as major && npm publish
